text: City Hall is a 1996 American suspense drama film directed by Harold Becker and starring Al Pacino, John Cusack, Bridget Fonda and Danny Aiello. It is a bout a fictional mayor of New York City after a police detective, a mafia man, and a child are all shot and killed at the same time. ==Cast== *Al Pacino as Mayor John Pappas *John Cusack as Kevin Calhoun *Danny Aiello as Frank Anselmo *Bridget Fonda as Marybeth Cogan *Anthony Franciosa as Paul Zapatti *Martin Landau as Judge Walter Stern *David Paymer as Abe Goodman *Richard Schiff as Larry Schwartz *Harry Bugin as Morty the Waiter ==References== Category:1996 drama movies Category:1990s American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Harold Becker
title: City Hall (1996 movie)
